docs.title: Home
docs.text:
Welcome to the documentation for the Stochastic Reserving Framework.

This project provides tooling for actuarial reserving. The documentation site is built with MkDocs.

See the top-level README.md for overview and installation instructions.

Navigation:

  • Home — this page
  • Usage — quick examples and how to import the package

docs.title: Usage
docs.text:
Quick example showing how to import the package and read the version.

import stochastic_reserving_framework as srf

print(srf.__version__)

When you expand the library, add short examples and code snippets here for common workflows (aggregation, reserving models, diagnostics).
